My apologies for completely changing this pull request after getting 4 approvals (this must be some kind of record!)

I followed @scpeters 's suggestion and moved the tutorial here:

1.  [2d48f0b](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/2d48f0bb2b6f483da2c5b39de3d9dcd6023888f6?at=gazebo7) is just porting the tutorial as is
2.  [cdc3e78](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/cdc3e783b3aba6ef45b981de3d08d61009889cd1?at=gazebo7) and [98b5145](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/98b51454e22528b66e2a403af8c8034ca6be10cf?at=gazebo7) have some new changes:
    1. Adapt to Bitbucket's markdown style (click on `View file` below to see how it renders)
    2. Remove repeated bits
    3. Update a few sections

I think there's a lot of room for improvement, but this could be a nice first pass. Personally, I'd like us to have a more detailed guide for absolute beginners, which can help onboarding future contributors.

I'll look later for a way to reuse this on `gazebo_tutorials`. This is the best I got so far:

http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=contrib\_code&cat=development&branch=contributing
